The shirky wording of the statement he issued today does not exactly enhance his reputation for straightforwardness. Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role, Andy Coulson said. and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come." " Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade," adds Page. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader, and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role. Google still has such incredible opportunity; we are only at the beginning, and I can't wait to get started. News of the World suspended its news editor, Ian Edmondson , over allegations of phone hacking in 2005-6, thought to involve the actress Sienna Miller . Asked about Mr Andy Coulson 's resignation, Labour leader Ed Miliband said: We think he should have gone earlier, he has now done the right thing. I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgement about hanging on to him as long as he did.
